events.name: History of Bodily Autonomy, Non-Heteronormative Political Impacts and Culture in Caribbean Communities
events.description: Join award-winning internationally touring recording artist and D.C. affiliate Director of Black Nonbelievers Rogiérs Fibby as he lectures regarding intra-community oppressive dynamics, sexual identities and revolution in the Caribbean communities. In addition to his work with Alicia Keys, Robert Glasper, Mo’Nique and others, he works closely with the American Humanist Association, Freedom From Religion Foundation, the Religious Freedom Forum, the Secular Coalition of America and serves on the board of the Washington Area Secular Humanists (
). Q&A to follow the lecture. Please join us in one of our three Back Parlors for this event.

events.name: Whimsical Blasphemy
events.description: Join DJ Mercy Maelica in one of our Grand Ballrooms all night long.

events.name: The Satanic Chef--Live!
events.description: The Satanic Chef live, is a live, interactive-cooking class on TSTVHQ. In these classes I combine unique cooking style in an entertaining & educating satanic context. Available in one of our three (3!) kitchens!

events.name: THOT Thoughts with Gloria Gray
events.description: Stand Up Comedy from Sex Worker/Activist/Comedian Gloria Gray. She speaks of the trials and tribulations of sex work and everything in-between. A true Stripper philosopher. Wait a truly hot stripper philosopher. Well both. Also available in the Garden, Boudoir and Ritual Chamber.

events.name: Feast of the FLESH
events.description: Sample the buffet of submitted written lust rituals with the ladies of FLESH: Michelle Shortt and Chalice Blythe Audience Q&A to follow.

events.name: Bats in the Belfry!
events.description: Livestreaming your new best friends, bats from BatWorld. Donate at batworld.org

events.description: Livestream of goats. Sponsor one of these good kids at woodstocksanctuary.org

events.description: Livestream of wolves. Donate at nywolf.org

events.name: Late Night Library: Satanic Archives
events.description: TSTVHQ's Satanic Archive Library is open all night. Texts courtesy of Center for Inquiry and Grey Faction.
